thread.section_title: Super 8 San Bruno /SF Intl Arpt West - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Convenient, quiet and decently priced
thread.title_full: Convenient, quiet and decently priced - Review of Super 8 San Bruno /SF Intl Arpt West, San Bruno, CA - TripAdvisor

author: torontogirl2009
title: Convenient, quiet and decently priced
text:
I would recommend this hotel if you need a place to stay close to the airport that is convenient and well-priced. The staff were super friendly, there is ample parking, it's easy to find, amenities (gas, dining, Walgreens) near by and the the rooms are recently renovated. I was a bit wary having a room on the 1st floor so close to the lobby but it was surprisingly quiet!
My only complaint was the air freshener in the room...FAR TOO MUCH! I had to open the window for 30 minutes to try and air it out a bit. Otherwise, I enjoyed my one night stay here and would recommend if you are passing through or flying into/out of SFO.
